About.title: About
About.zero: I am a Systems Engineer with
About.one: My name is Anibal Rivera. I am a Systems Engineer with
About.two: years of experience as a Full Stack Developer with rock-solid experience in building web applications. I've worked in various areas as a front-end developer, back-end developer, database, and cloud services. I possess the unique ability to tackle intricate technical challenges while crafting websites that exude sleekness and visual allure.
About.three: I am very passionate and dedicated to my work, which makes me organized and get things done in the shortest amount of time requested.
About.four: When I'm not programming, I'm usually playing video games, watching movies or series with my wife, or practicing martial arts.
About.five: I'm open to Job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience, don't hesitate to contact me.
About.six: My main quality is being self-taught. In my dictionary there are no negative words like: I don't know and I can't. If at the moment I do not have the necessary knowledge, I reinforce them to achieve the desired objectives.

Skill.title: Skills
Skill.frontend: Create client-side applications with modern features, applying good programming practices and SEO optimization. Making use of modern technologies such as React (NextJS) and TailwindCSS.
Skill.backend: Build scalable and maintainable server applications using cutting-edge technologies such as Nodejs (Nest.js), Docker, and MongoDB, or PostgreSQL.
